thi-ap17:2.3: Tahiṁ kate → tahiṁyeva (sya1ed, sya2ed); tahiṁ setapure (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:21.1: vajantiyo → vajantiṁ taṁ (bj); vajantī taṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); vajantīnaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:36.3: Anindito → anindiyo (bj, pts-vp-pli1); ānandiyo (sya1ed, sya2ed) | dhammakāyo → dhammatanu (si, pts-vp-pli1, mr)
thi-ap17:90.2: merumūlanadantare → merumandāradaddare (bj, pts-vp-pli1); meruṁ mandāradaddare (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap17:102.2: dhammameghaṁ anāsavaṁ → dhammameghamanāsavaṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); dhammameghaṁ pavassayaṁ (mr)
thi-ap17:102.4: raṁsijālasamujjalaṁ → raṁsimālākulaṁ jinaṁ (bj, sya1ed, sya2ed); raṁsijālākulaṁ jinaṁ (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:110.1: Taṁ sutvāna pamoditvā → taṁ sutvāna pamuditā (bj); taṁ sutvāhaṁ pamuditā (si, sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:117.1: hutvāva sabbāyo → katvā pañcasatakuṭī (bj); katvā pañcasataṁ kuṭiṁ (sya1ed, sya2ed); pūgā bhavitvā sabbāyo (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:121.1: Mama puttobhinikkhamma → sa me putto … (sya1ed, sya2ed)
thi-ap17:125.4: kammaññassa susikkhito → puññakammesu sikkhitā (sya1ed, sya2ed); kammaññassa susikkito (pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:134.1: Atthe dhamme ca nerutte → atthe ca dhamme nerutte (bj)
thi-ap17:138.3: Anusaṁyāyī so → anusaṁsāvayi (sya1ed, sya2ed); anusaṁyāyi so (pts-vp-pli1); anusaṁsāvayī (mr) | vīro → dhīro (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:178.1: Buddho buddhassa nibbāne → na buddho buddhanibbāne (sya1ed, sya2ed, pts-vp-pli1)
thi-ap17:185.1: Aho acchariyaṁ mayhaṁ → ānanda passa buddhassa (sya1ed, sya2ed)
